hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Aswad:That `Aisha said, "O Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)! The people are returning after performing the two Nusuks (i.e. Hajj and `Umra) but I am returning with one only?" He said, "Wait till you become clean from your menses and then go to at-Tan`im, assume Ihram (and after performing `Umra) join us at such-andsuch a place. But it (i.e. the reward if `Umra) is according to your expenses or the hardship (which you will undergo while performing it)

chapter.ara-name: باب أَجْرِ الْعُمْرَةِ عَلَى قَدْرِ النَّصَبِ
chapter.eng-name: The reward of 'Umra is according to hardship
